task.title: Processing files with .bat script
task.shortdesc: This document explains how to use a .bat script to process backlog transactions Karaf incidents.

taskbody.prereq: Ensure that the files to be processed are stored in the (source path).

context.p: To automatically process transactions in the backlog using the .bat script, follow the steps below:

step.cmd: On the Karaf server, navigate to the path C:\KARAF_TROUBLESHOOTING.
Double-click on move_karaf_files_script.bat script file, provide the source path and the destination path when prompted and press enter.

taskbody.result: The transactions will automatically move from source path to destination path one at a time, with a five second delay between each transaction.
